general.about:
ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I'm Saba â€” a product designer specializing in design systems, with hands-on experience in setting up system foundations, mapping their structures, and setting up governance models. I've led the development of various component libraries, and documenting systems from the overall framework to the details of individual component usage. 

For the past 4 years, I've contributed to a multi-brand, multi-platform design system for a leading bank in Georgia. Worked with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth adoption, while keeping a close eye on system metrics to make informed improvements.

projects.heading: Set up design tokens system to handle theming and more
projects.description:
The project established a single source of truth with tools that translate JSON design tokens into formats for Figma, CSS, Sass, Kotlin, and Swift. It introduced semantic tokens and a clear naming convention, enhancing collaboration and consistency.

* Centralized design token management across multiple platforms

* Automated token translation using Tokens Studio and Style Dictionary

* Supported theming using semantic tokens

* 15% reduction in Time To Market

* Increased UI consistency

* Improved communication between designers and developers

* Clear and detailed documentation for easier adoption and maintenance
projects.title: Set up design tokens system to handle theming and more

projects.heading: Built a color system with accessibility and scalability in mind
projects.description:
Worked on creating a robust, scalable, and accessible color system for the TBCx Design system.

* Created color structure supporting multiple products with multiple brands

* Embedded accessibility into the system through standardized contrast ratios for all color scales

* Came up with a clear structure and well-defined rules for expansion

* Laid down the strong base for upcoming semantic tokens and theming projects

 ðŸ‘‰ [Full case study here](https://medium.com/tbc-design/building-a-color-system-with-accessibility-and-scalability-in-mind-1a8fd44fb44b)
projects.title: Built a color system with accessibility and scalability in mind

projects.heading: Designed a federative structure and contribution model for multi-platform and multi-brand design system
projects.description:
Built contribution rules and process documentation from scratch to create a federative, community-driven design system where teams contribute to the product libraries they use.

* Defined contribution guidelines, approval processes, and governance structure that creates a central point of control while enabling teams to contribute

* Created clear documentation covering contribution workflows, review criteria, maintenance responsibilities, and distributed ownership model

* Avoided bottlenecks by establishing distributed maintenance rules across contributing teams

* Led series of workshops with product designers to deliver new ways of working and ensure team alignment with the collaborative approach
projects.title: Designed a federative structure and contribution model for multi-platform and multi-brand design system

workExperience.heading: Product designer - Design systems at TBC Bank
workExperience.title: Product designer - Design systems
workExperience.description:
As a Product Designer at TBC, I focus on Design Systemsâ€”designing and maintaining UI component libraries, evolving the system, creating clear documentation, and driving adoption through collaboration with cross-functional teams. During my time here, I have:

* Led the development and maintenance of the system's Foundations.

* Driven the creation and evolution of multiple component libraries.

* Built a multiplatform token structure to enable theming and ensure consistency.

* Documented the system in depth, covering structure, governance, contribution, tokens, theming, and components.

* Advocated for system adoption and guided product teams throughout the process.

workExperience.heading: Product designer - Mobile team at Leavingstone
workExperience.title: Product designer - Mobile team
workExperience.description: At Leavingstone, my job was to design user-friendly, intuitive, clean, and visually compelling user interfaces for mobile apps in many different fields. The company has international clients, such as Netflix and Siemens.

workExperience.heading: UI designer at Artmedia
workExperience.title: UI designer
workExperience.description: At Artmedia, my job was to design user-friendly, intuitive, clean, and visually compelling user interfaces for web pages and mobile apps in many different fields. The company also owns a car service startup (mobile app) that I've been working on since starting.
